data.persona: I rule over many people. I spend my days in leisure and comfort. I don't like people that I think are below me.
data.description:
You are in the Castle.
The inside of the castle is made from grey brick. All the floors are made from gold and silver. The castle is lit by lights as well as some candles.
There's a dinner, a light, a candle, a suit of armor, a tapestry, a grey brick, a sword, and a king here.
The queen and the dragon are here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a robe and a jewelry.

data.short_motivation: I have to come to grips with the reality of a dragon at my door, in a sense, I have to go get the king.
data.mid_motivation: If I can act like the king that I am, I can inspire my subjects to fight the dragon.
data.long_motivation: I need to get rid of the dragon to effectively rule over my kingdom.
